channel.title: Server status
channel.description:
I'm just wondering i posted a server like 4 days ago called 'Ilusionx' and it still hasn't been verified then when i try to re-add it, it says its already added..
now i used my vps ip and register another server today and still nothing..

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

There’s a thread that handles these types of questions.

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Infinity Zr, post:4, topic:403787”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=500850.msg3663675#msg3663675 date=1310495956]
Adding a topic in a section that it doesn’t pertain to, would be counted as spamming.

Thus, you are the idiot.
[/quote]

Wasn’t thinking where i was posting… but i ain’t spamming any section am i… so stop trying to be smart…[/quote]So you just admitted to spamming, but just obviously don’t know the definition. Posting something where it shouldn’t be is spamming, dum-dum.

Read full topic

item.description:

Thus, you are the idiot.[/quote]

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

Slave Scyth:

So you be patient or contact a higher-up. You don’t spam the forums. (Especially not a section that has nothing to do with private server help.)

I wasn’t spamming idiot.
do you see me spamming the forums making 100’s of threads… no you don’t!

Read full topic
